trans-unit.source: A special kind of property that can be defined or attached to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Un tipo speciale di proprietà che può essere definita o collegata a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: There are three kinds of dependency properties: instance properties, meta properties, and attached properties.
trans-unit.target: Esistono tre tipi di proprietà di dipendenza: proprietà delle istanze, metaproprietà e proprietà collegate.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties support three use cases.
trans-unit.target: Le proprietà di dipendenza supportano tre casi d'uso.

trans-unit.source: First, if an instance property of an activity is implemented by using a dependency property, that property can be assigned an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> instead of an actual value.
trans-unit.target: Primo, se una proprietà delle istanze di un'attività viene implementata utilizzando una proprietà di dipendenza, è possibile assegnare a tale proprietà una classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> anziché un valore effettivo.

trans-unit.source: Second, activity properties that are metadata (that is, the value cannot change at run time) should be implemented by using dependency properties, specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions.Metadata> option.
trans-unit.target: Secondo, le proprietà di attività che sono metadati (ovvero, non è possibile modificarne il valore in fase di esecuzione) devono essere implementate utilizzando proprietà di dipendenza, specificando l'opzione <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyOptions.Metadata>.

trans-unit.source: Third, dependency properties support attached properties, which are properties that are applied to dependency objects dynamically.
trans-unit.target: Terzo, le proprietà di dipendenza supportano le proprietà collegate, che sono proprietà applicate dinamicamente agli oggetti di dipendenza.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to register a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> for use by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio riportato di seguito viene mostrato come registrare <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> per l'utilizzo da parte di una classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Send Email SDK sample and is from the SendMailActivity.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice è parte dell'esempio SDK Send di posta elettronica e si trova nel file SendMailActivity.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Send Mail Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [inviare posta elettronica attività](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata" /> that represents user-defined data for this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata" /> che rappresenta i dati definiti dall'utente per <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata" /> per <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The required value of <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore obbligatorio di <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the registered <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> based on the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name" /> and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la classe registrata <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> in base a <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name" /> e <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType" />.

trans-unit.source: The registered <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> based on the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name" /> and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType" />.
trans-unit.target: Classe registrata <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> in base a <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name" /> e <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Type" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that belong to a specific <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un’interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> di tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> che appartiene a uno specifico <see cref="T:System.Type" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that belong to a specific <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> che appartiene a uno specifico <see cref="T:System.Type" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: The hash code computed here is the `bitwise AND` of the hash codes generated by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A> attributes of this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Il codice hash calcolato è il `bitwise AND` dei codici hash generati da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Name%2A> e con gli attributi <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A> di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> is associated to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> by registration.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la proprietà che indica se la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> è associata a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> mediante registrazione.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if attached to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se collegato a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The value returned indicates whether this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> has been registered by using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito indica se la classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> è stata registrata utilizzando il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> is an event <see cref="T:System.Delegate" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la proprietà che indica se la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> è un evento <see cref="T:System.Delegate" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> is an event <see cref="T:System.Delegate" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> è un evento <see cref="T:System.Delegate" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il nome della proprietà o evento sottoposto a mirroring da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
